text:
@realDonaldTrump Where are the respirators? 
Where are the masks?
where are the essential medical equipment like respirators and protective gear?

WHERE ARE THE TESTS?

Trump is Killing US!!

Trump 
@realDonaldTrump
  should resign today!!!

#COVID19 #Coronavirus
#TrumpCoronaCrisis
#TrumpResign

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
